directions.dialogText: Last time we learned about addition. Now, let's try subtraction! Create two variables called \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` and give them number values. Then create a variable called  \`difference\` with a value of \`firstNumber - secondNumber\`.

levels.mission: Create two variables called \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` and give them number values. Then create a variable called  \`difference\` with a value of \`firstNumber - secondNumber\`. To get the numbers that will pass this level, click on the lightning bolt on the left.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains a number  \`secondNumber\`: contains a number

\`difference\`: contains difference between \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`
levels.tips: To pass this level, give \`firstNumber\` a value of \`16\`, \`secondNumber\` a value of \`9\`, and \`difference\` a value of \`firstNumber - secondNumber\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`strawberry\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`vanilla\` from \`cones\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`strawberry\` the correct number value by subtracting \`vanilla\` from \`cones\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`vanilla\`: contains the number of vanilla  \`cones\`: contains the number of cones

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`cones - vanilla\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`foxes\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`chickens\` from \`animals\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`foxes\` the correct number value by subtracting \`chickens\` from \`animals\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`chickens\`: contains the number of chickens  \`animals\`: contains the number of animals

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`animals - chickens\`.

directions.dialogText: Declare a variable called \`emptyPads\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`yellow\` and \`green\` from \`lillypads\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Create the variable \`emptyPads\` and give it the correct number value by subtracting \`yellow\` and \`green\` from \`lillypads\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`yellow\`: contains the number of yellow frogs

\`green\`: contains the number of green frogs

\`lillypads\`: contains the number of lillypads

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`lillypads - yellow - green\`.

quiz.text: If the variable \`doughnuts\` contains the number of \`chocolate\` and \`glazed\`, which choice would give \`doughnuts\` the correct value?
Which choice would give the variable \`number\` a value of \`5\`

directions.dialogText: Create a variable called \`chocolate\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`sprinkles\` and \`glazed\` from \`doughnuts\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Create the variable \`chocolate\` and give it the correct number value by subtracting \`sprinkles\` and \`glazed\` from \`doughnuts\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`sprinkles\`: contains the number of doughnuts with sprinkles

\`glazed\`: contains the number of glazed doughnuts

\`doughnuts\`: contains the total number of doughnuts

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`doughnuts - sprinkles - glazed\`.

directions.dialogText: Now let's add AND subtract! Declare a variable called \`doubles\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`chocolate\` and \`strawberry\` and then subtracting \`singles\`.

levels.mission: Create the variable \`doubles\` and give it the correct number value by adding \`chocolate\` and \`strawberry\` and then subtracting \`singles\`.
levels.tools:
\`chocolate\`: contains the number of cones with chocolate ice cream

\`strawberry\`: contains the number of cones with strawberry ice cream

\`singles\`: contains the number of cones with a single scoop

\`+\`: adds numbers together

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`chocolate + strawberry - singles\`.

directions.dialogText: Create a variable called \`ninjas\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`chickens\` and \`foxes\` and then subtracting \`cowboys\`.

levels.mission: Create the variable \`ninjas\` and give it the correct number value by adding \`chickens\` and \`foxes\` and then subtracting \`cowboys\`.
levels.tools:
\`chickens\`: contains the number of chickens

\`foxes\`: contains the number of foxes

\`cowboys\`: contains the number of cowboys

\`+\`: adds numbers together

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`chickens + foxes - cowboys\`.
